title: Mukteshwar Mountainside Cottage Retreat with Daily Breakfast
description:
Find your paradise in the lap of the majestic Himalayas at the beautiful Digantaa Resort Mukteshwar. A hillside retreat located eight hours from Delhi, Digantaa offers exquisitely designed pinewood cottages scattered across 10 acres of lush orchard in Mukteshwar, overlooking the snowy Himalayan peaks. A travellers' favourite, this tranquil retreat is ranked among the top 10% worldwide on Tripadvisor.

Enjoy panoramic views of the hills, fresh mountain air, warm hospitality and an all-pervading quietude that cannot be found elsewhere. When you're not relaxing, keep yourself busy with luxurious experiences such as hiking, cycling, spa treatments and fun games, and soak in the rich culture of this dreamy hill station.
offer_address: Village Kaul Mukteshwar, Dhari - Bhatelia Rd, Dhanachuli, Uttarakhand 263132
